languageKey.label: SAV Library Kickstarter > Types > Date
Attributes for the type Date
xEXT_sav_library_kickstarter_all:*,xEXT_sav_library_kickstarter_functions:*,xEXT_sav_library_kickstarter_general:*
format = date_format;
Sets a format to display the date. The format is the same as in strftime php function, e.g. format = %d/%m/%Y;
noDefault = 1;
Do not display the default date.
